name: ng-cabled
description: Library for ease of creating extensible angular components

scripts.test2: tsc -p tsconfig.test.json && cd test-build && ../tomjs && node --enable-source-maps=true --experimental-specifier-resolution=node ./main.test.mjs && NG_CABLED_USE_PROXY=1 node --enable-source-maps=true --experimental-specifier-resolution=node ./main.test.mjs
scripts.test: ng build js && node ./test-build/main.js && NG_CABLED_USE_PROXY=1 node ./test-build/main.js
scripts.pack: npm run pre && cd dist && npm pack
scripts.publish: npm run pre && cp README.md ./dist/README.md && cd dist && npm publish

author: Cosmin Popescu
